meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bluish in color.
meanings.sent1: The bluishnesses of the sky were breathtaking at sunset.
meanings.sent2: I love the bluishnesses of the ocean on a clear day.
meanings.sent3: The artist exaggerated the bluishnesses of the painting, making it look surreal.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a bluishnesses that seemed to hold secrets.
meanings.sent5: The bluishnesses of the mountain range in the distance was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The bluish tint or hue of something.
meanings.sent1: The bluishnesses of the dress made it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The bluishnesses of the flower petals added a touch of elegance to the bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The bluishnesses of the ice cream made it look like a delicious treat.
meanings.sent4: The bluishnesses of the sky reflected on the calm lake, creating a serene scene.
meanings.sent5: The bluishnesses of the gemstone shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The presence of bluish tones or shades.
meanings.sent1: The bluishnesses in the painting gave it a cool and calming effect.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the bluishnesses in her hair under the bright lights.
meanings.sent3: The bluishnesses of the clouds made them look like cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: The bluishnesses of the shadows elongated as the sun began to set.
meanings.sent5: The bluishnesses of the twilight sky signaled the end of the day.
